post:
# ★ LizCat ★ RAID 10 - SAS ★ From $4/Mo ★ Hong Kong ★ 1Gbps Port ★ 500G/1T/2T/3T Bandwidth

We got a new contract for our Hong Kong Node. Here is our new offer. You will pay less money but get more!

**_Packages_**

Prices listed are in USD, Paypal and Alipay are available with no extra transaction fee.
Monthly and yearly billing are available. Yearly billing only costs you 10 months' price.
Multiple OS are available for installation, including Ubuntu 12.04/14.04/16.04, CentOS 6/7, Debian 6/7/8 and Fedora 17/18/20/23 (all are 64bit version).
Prices listed here are discounted price.

**_Features Include_**

* DIY Bandwidth
* Powerful Intel Xeon CPU
* KVM Full Virtualisation
* Hardware Raid10
* 1Gbps Port

**_HK Special-256_**

* 1 vCore
* 256 MiB Dedicated RAM (DDR3)
* 5GB RAID10 HDD
* 1 IPv4 Address
* 10 IPv6 Address
* 1 Gbps Port
* Free 500GB Data Transfer 
* Unmanaged server
* Prorata Billing (Every month 1st)
* $4/Month
* $40/Year
[Order Here](https://www.lizcat.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=36)


**_HK Special-512_**

* 1 vCore
* 512 MiB Dedicated RAM (DDR3)
* 10GB RAID10 HDD
* 1 IPv4 Address
* 10 IPv6 Address
* 1 Gbps Port
* Free 1TB Data Transfer 
* Unmanaged server
* Prorata Billing (Every month 1st)
* $7/Month
[Order Here](https://www.lizcat.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=57)


Available in LeaseWeb, Hong Kong.

**_Available KVM Operating Systems_**

* CentOS 6/7
* Debian 6/7/8
* Ubuntu 12/14/16
* Fedora 17/18/20/23

**_QnA_**

1. What's the time required for delivering?

Usually within 300 seconds after payment is received. If your service is still pending after 300 seconds, you may contact us via Tickets.

2. Do you support Paypal Automatically Payment?

No, we don't.

3. What applications or services are prohibited to run on your server?

Please refer to our ToS.

4. Do you have other smaller/bigger packages?

There are no smaller packages available. Bigger packages are available and you may submit a ticket after you place an order (don't pay first) and tell us how much resource you need. We can calculate the cost for you. Of course, Life Time 20% off also applies to customized servers.

**_Additional Options_**

★ IPv4 rDNS ★ Free rDNS we will give you $<del>10/mo</del> **FREE!**


Please feel free to contact our sales with if you got any questions; we can customize your plan to your needs.

**_More about_**

ToS: [Click here](https://www.lizcat.net/tos.html)

BGP info: [Click here](http://bgp.he.net/AS133926)

Test IP: PM me Please

Looking Glass: PM me Please
